subject: Physical Fitness
title: Sleep Is When You Get Stronger
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Sleep Is When You Get Stronger.

hook.text: You don't get stronger during your workout. The growth happens at night, while you're unconscious.

buildup.text: Training creates micro-tears and stress. Sleep is when the body repairs, rebuilds, and reinforces tissue.

discovery.text: Growth hormone peaks during deep sleep â€” up to 75% of daily production happens while you're asleep.

twist.text: Cut sleep to six hours and growth hormone drops dramatically. The repair crew gets sent home early.

climax.text: Elite athletes sleep 9â€“10 hours a night. They know recovery is where adaptation actually happens.

punchline.text: Train hard, then sleep harder. The gains happen under the covers.
